TopicTitle: Another weekend well spent. I present you, the Anerak Mech.

Articles.Content:
This is what happens when I listen to audiobooks that include giant mechs.

It\'s floppy as hell on it\'s way up and crashed when I tried to land it on the Mun, but otherwise it\'s fun to destroy stuff with the lasers.

Full Album here: http://imgur.com/a/WhkNO

Hopefully I did not miss any of the mods:


  • [li]DamnedRobotics_1.1[/li]
    [li]Kosmos[/li]
    [li]Angara[/li]
    [li]DSM[/li]
    [li]hstwlaser[/li]
    [li]NovaPunch[/li]
    [li]MechJeb[/li]
    [li]The Truss Pack[/li]
    [li]Silisko Industries - BACE 0.3(1) and Probodobodyne DIY Kit[/li]
    [li]NovaPunch v1.1alpha
    [/li]

Craft File is attached.

'Mech'

*thinks it walks*

*is actually rocket*

Still hilarious though, with the waving arms shooting laser beams everywhere!

Reminds me of a sequence in Invader Zim\'s first episode. 'I put the fires out!' 'You made them worse!!!' 'Worse... or better?'

http://nicktoons.nick.com/videos/clip/nightmare-begins-clip.html (0:40 seconds through about 1:20)
Reminds me of the original 80\'s Transformers cartoon. Well done.
